description: Lightweight, versatile, breathable, and dynamic; the Alterra Lite is the perfect shoe when comfort is paramount on your daily hikes on variable terrain. From hot days to fall peak bagging the Alterra Lite can and will accompany you almost everywhere. The shoe's upper external suede wraps around the internal knit material giving you a secure, comfortable all day fit.
name: Aku Alterra Lite GTX - Mens
